translation.goSignIn: Already have account? Go and Sign-In
translation.goSignUp: No account? Go and Sing-Up new one
translation.converterDescription: If you want to swap fields you can drag them and drop
translation.chartsDescription: On the chart you will see the ratio of the selected currency to the currencies selected by the checkboxes. The value is taken from 1 unit of the selected currency to 1 unit of the currency selected by the checkbox
translation.mapsDescription: Here you can write the name of the country you want to receive information about. To get information about the selected country, move the mouse over the marker on the map.
